meanings.definition: Sign at the bottom of a document
meanings.sent1: The undersign on the contract was clear and legible.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to include your undersign on the form.
meanings.sent3: The undersign on the paper seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: Her undersign on the agreement sealed the deal.
meanings.sent5: The undersign on the will held great importance.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name at the bottom of a document
meanings.sent1: I will undersign the letter before sending it out.
meanings.sent2: Remember to undersign the check before depositing it.
meanings.sent3: He always hesitates before he has to undersign something.
meanings.sent4: She decided to undersign the contract with a flourish.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully undersigned each painting with pride.
